instructions: On the phone setup screen, draw an " L" with your finger to display TalkBack controls. Tap Pause feedback , and then double-tap to pause TalkBack . Tap the OK button, and then double-tap the screen to suspend TalkBack . Tap Accessibility settings . If you don't see this button, you may need to tap Vision settings or Tools first. Tap TalkBack , and then tap the On/Off switch to turn TalkBack off. Tap BACK to return to the language screen.
